Generation V.Black: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.
Generation V.White: With their sucker mouths, they suck in prey. Then they use their fangs to shock the prey with electricity.
Generation V.Black 2: It latches on to prey with its sucker mouth, sinking in its fangs and shocking the prey with powerful electricity.
